banMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

banMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
banMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

banMod:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

banMod:CapturedWildfire.NAME: Captured Wildfire
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E]. Upon pickup, remove and ban all copies of 2 random cards from your deck. Prioritizes upgraded cards.

banMod:CheapLighter.NAME: Cheap Lighter
DESCRIPTIONS: At campfires, you may ban a card as a free action.

banMod:CrashTestDummy.NAME: Crash Test Dummy
DESCRIPTIONS: Pick an Elite. The next time you would encounter that Elite, generate a different random elite instead.

banMod:RakkoonTail.NAME: Rakkoon Tail
DESCRIPTIONS: Pick one Elite. Pick one boss. You won't encounter either in the next act.

banMod:StellarCharm.NAME: Stellar Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, ban a curse. Remove all copies of it from your deck.

banMod:FeatherToken.NAME: Feather Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Pick a status. Whenever you draw that card, exhaust it and draw a new card.
, exhaust it and draw another card.

banMod:FoolsGold.NAME: Fool's Gold
DESCRIPTIONS: Obtain a selection of a rare card. If you choose one, ban the unchosen ones.
